name: Magic Farm: Ultimate Flower
description:
In the award-winning game Magic Farm: Ultimate Flower, Iris and her pet dragon Robin need money so that Iris can find her missing parents! Help Iris earn enough money by growing and
selling a huge variety of unique and magical plants. Use your blossoming
bounty to assemble beautiful bouquets for your enchanting clients and
earn even more money and increase Iris's skills with experience points and
expand your garden beyond your wildest dreams!
System Requirements
OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista

CPU: 700 MHz Pentium 3 or equivalent

RAM: 256MB RAM

Video Card: DirectX 8 compatible
